transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Helllo
Executive: Haanji Harsh ji Saloni bol rahi hu, maine WhatsApp pe call kiya tha na mujhe abhi 10:30 ke aas pass.
Customer: Haanji haanji haanji.
Executive: Haanji ye aapka dusra number hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi ye actually abhi recorded call se aaj call ja rahi hai is wajah se aa raha hai. Isko mat save kariyega wahi number hai jo aapne kara tha.
Executive: Nahi wo mai actually kyuki mai koi confusion na rahega na baat kis se karni hai isliye pucha aap.
Customer: Nahi aap usi pe kariyega jispe aapne us time mujhe call kiya tha mai meeting me thi isliye call nahi utha paayi thi. To aap us pe hi karna jab bhi karna.
Executive: Thik hai mam koi dikkat nahi hai. Mai ye puch raha tha abhi maine subah subah 8-10 leads li hai. Usme se chaar aur kal bhi maine mark kari hai agar aap account dekh payenge chaar leads hai jo unki requirement hi kuch aur thi aur air filter foam bana ke de di.
Abhi bhi subah teen maine dekhe hai jo keh rahe hai ji humne order hi nahi kiya aur humne dekha aur hamare pass mere keyword ki requirement aa rahi hai.
Mam ye to baat galat ho jayegi na bahut jyada galat ho jayegi.
Executive: Matlab wo specifically aapko waha pe ye bol rahe hai ki maine requirement hi nahi dala hai.
Customer: Nahi keh rahe ji humne isliye humne excel p form kiya abhi ek se baat hui wo keh raha hai bhai sahab excel p form ke liye hume requirement dalni chahiye. So I don't even know air filter foam wagera kya hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ek ne bola tha ki maine kaha ki hmm bolo ek ka kuch dry foam tha aapka matlab aapke jo IndiaMART me wo kuch dry foam ke naam se maine usse baat ki maine accept kar li.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone bola humne inquiry kari hi nahi hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Fir unhone ye to bola excel p kiya hai unhone kaha kari nahi hai. To mai ye aap dekhiye yahi dikkat mai unko bhi bol raha tha jo dusre bhai sahab hai kya naam hai unka.
Executive: Sanjeev ji.
Customer: Sanjeev ji Sanjeev ji aur yahi maine aapko bhi us din toka tha mam bahut sari chize achha last time aapne kaha tha mark karo agar mismatch ho raha hai maine is bari ab isme kya hai aap isme mismatch mark nahi kar sakte sirf desktop pe kar sakte hai laptop pe kar sakte ho. Kal maine chaar inquiries ko requirement mismatch karke mark kiya hai ki unhone kuch aur manga hoga aapne mismatch software ne kar diya aur mere pass aa gaya to requirement mismatch karke kiya hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Chaar inquiry ko kal kiya hai I am sure agar aap system pe baithenge aap dekhenge to aapko dikh jayega aapke pass sare parameters hai.
Executive: Wo matlab direct direct aapke pass aayi thi ya by leads se hi aayi thi wo bhi?
Customer: Nahi mam by leads direct ka to matlab inka direct to aata hi kuch is tarah se.
Executive: Achha abhi aap sara okay overall aap sara by leads ka hi bata rahe hai na ye?
Customer: Mai aapko wo by leads bata raha hu mam jinme specifically likha hai air filter foam air filter foam air filter foam. Jo mera product hai nahi kyuki mai agar usko consume nahi karunga to system samjhega maine kaam nahi kiya ab mai consume kar raha hu aur ye response aa raha hai to ye to mere ko aapko batana hi padega na ki mam mismatch ho raha hai requirement ye aapko keh raha hu.
Executive: Haan aap log hi bhej nahi wo koi dikkat nahi hai us chiz ki aap mujhe bhej dijiye mai abhi aapko usme na ek group bhi bana rahi hu abhi aapka uske regarding to aap.
Customer: Aap dekh lo na mai ab isme kya bheju aapko maine to likh ke bhej diya.
Executive: Are sir hamare pass data nahi hota maine us din bhi to aapko bataya tha na ye chize kuch ki hamare pass data visible nahi hota hai to aapko wo chize hume bhejni padegi.
Customer: To mai kaha se bheju aapko ye batao.
Executive: Mai aapko abhi mai aapko abhi group bana rahi hu.
Customer: Aap aage kariyega mai kaha se bheju aap kya kya kaam karaoge mujhse kyuki wo usme to simple maine requirement mismatch karke baat khatam ho gayi.
Executive: Sir maine aapko jab us din discussion kiya tha aapne screen maine I think share kari thi ki nahi mujhe yaad nahi hai but maine aapko ye dikhaya tha na ki hamare pass dummy account hota hai hume aapka koi data nahi dikhta hai even aapke hume number mail id kuch bhi nahi dikhta hai to wo allow.
Customer: Complaint to raise kar sakte ho apne end se ye ya feedback to de sakte ho team ko aage.
Executive: Sir feedback dene ki zarurat hi nahi hai aap mujhe sidhe sidhe by lead bhej dijiye mai sidhe sidhe by lead ko concern hi raise kar dungi na aap mujhe by lead ka screenshot to bhejiye ki is buyer ka ye number hai iska ye requirement hai aur isne deny kara tha aapne jaise mujhe bataya mai sidhe sidhe team ko wahi forward kar dungi.
Aapka ye concern raise kar dungi.
Customer: Ek second sunta hu. Mere ko sare sir aap bhejoge kitne aap bhejoge hi nahi to kitne se kya mai at least ek do to aapne jo mujhe bataye hai abhi pehle wo to bhejiye pehle us pe to mai nikal ke dekhti hu solution unhone kya diya hai agar wo still barabar continuously aayega to uske according mai unko bataungi na ki dekhiye client ne already aapko chaar paanch bhej rakhe the ya saat aath bhej rakhe the.
Executive: Mail pe aaya hua hai wo bhej raha hu aur usme by lead details me likha hua hai air filter foam inhone to excel p bola hai aur ek ek aur do aapko bhej raha hu abhi mai aur baki jab mai system pe baithunga to mai aapko photo khich khich ke jo chaar maine ya teen maine kal mark kiya wo bhi bhej dunga.
Executive: Haan matlab jo specifically sir by leads wala hai na uska hi bhejiye ga jinpe aapne baat kar li hai aapko pata hai ki is buyer ne deny kar diya hai aap mujhe unka hi bhejna jo jo chize aapne mujhe batai hai to mai wahi chize na aage.
Customer: Wo maine kal by lead li thi usme se bhi teen log the jinki requirement kuch aur thi mismatch tha.
Executive: Haan haan thik hai wo bhej dijiye.
Customer: Jinko maine mark kiya na unko aapka bhej dunga aur jo abhi do bhej raha hu aapko jinhone mere ko specifically bola hai ji hamari requirement nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ye sirf mai abhi wahi bhej raha hu jinki requirement nahi hai.
Executive: Wo wo by lead hi hai na sir aapki?
Customer: Mam yaha likha hua hai by lead through IndiaMART ab kaise bolu aur.
Executive: Are mai confirm kar rahi hu aap irritate kyu hone lag jate hai turant mai aapse confirm kar rahi thi wo by lead hi hai na kyuki inquiry pe waha mai raise karungi wo sidhe sidhe lag denge ki inquiry hai to direct connect hua hai isliye mai puch rahi hu aapse mujhe mujhe aur bhi deny mai aapse kar rahi hu kya ek baar bhi aap turant dusra question mai kya puch leti hu reconfirm karne ke liye aap irritate ho jate hai turant mujhe confirm karna padega isliye kyuki mujhe aage team ko mention karke raise karna hai wo sari chize to mujhe reconfirm to karna padta hai.
Customer: By lead me jaake agar related me dekhenge to wo bhi by lead mani jayegi nahi mani jayegi?
Executive: Nahi aap by lead section me jitna bhi contact buyer wo consume karne ka jo option aata hai na aap usme chahe relevant pe kariye chahe recent pe kariye jaise bhi aap consume agar kar rahe ho wo aapka pura pura by lead hi hota hai aapko direct agar koi buyer mail bhej kar ke bol raha hai na directly ki ye inquiry hai usme likha bhi hota hai inquiry wo direct hota hai wo buyer apne according direct reach kar raha hai without hume koi bhi requirement yaha pe post kare to wo direct reach pe hum nahi kuch kar sakte hai ya direct call pe nahi kar sakte but by lead pe kar sakte hai by lead hai agar to aap mujhe bhejiye bilkul mai team ko bhi bhejungi wo chize.
Customer: Aur agar catalog views me mai dekh raha hu to bhi by lead mani jayegi ki nahi?
Executive: Catalog view to mix ho gaya usme jo bhi aap agar catalog view dekh rahe ho agar catalog view me na do scenario ho jate hai jaise ki agar catalog view ka alag se section hai aur waha pe dikha raha hai aap consume kar liya aapne fir waha pe buyer ke do chize ho sakta hai wo catalog dekh kar ke wo waha pe interested nahi ho but kind of thoda bahut usne product dekhe ho ho sakta hai abhi nahi lena ho to sir wo sare scenarios ban jate hai but aap mujhe bhej dena agar catalog view ka bhi ek do concern hai aap mujhe bhejna usse pehle mai khud buyer se baat kar lungi fir mai raise kar lungi ki agar buyer ne excel me aisa kuch dala.
Customer: Catalog view wale nahi bhej raha aapko mai aapko bhej raha hu jo kal maine pehle mai unka bhej deta hu aapko aap unke dekh lo.
Executive: Haan haan thik thik hai aap uske bhej dijiye aur short me bas ye likh dena ye buyer ne mana kar diya matlab jo aapne mujhe puri story bata di but usme short me likh dena taki mai specifically waha pe elaborate kar du ki is buyer ka ye reason tha.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai haanji okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads (air filter foam).

- Unable to mark mismatch on laptop.

- Irritated by the executive asking for confirmation.



Resolution:

- Executive created a group to share buyleads.

- Executive explained how to identify buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshots of irrelevant buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mismatch, excel p form, catalog view
